mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_stats ( full_short_url, gid, date, pv, uv, uip, hour, weekday, create_time, update_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{pv}, #{uv}, #{uip}, #{hour}, #{weekday}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pv = pv + #{pv}, uv = uv + #{uv}, uip = uip + #{uip}, update_time = #{updateTime};
mapper.select:
SELECT hour,SUM(pv) AS pv FROM t_link_access_stats las
inner join t_link l on las.full_short_url = l.full_short_url and las.gid = l.gid and l.del_flag = 0
WHERE las.full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND las.gid = #{gid} AND las.date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY las.full_short_url, las.gid, las.hour
